inclusion.criterion: no medical contraindication to participating in a strength training program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to follow complex directions as determined by a score of ≤1 on a subset of questions taken from the NIH Stroke scale (Brott et al. 1989)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: hip extension strength: up to 18.3 kg
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: normal passive range of motion at hips/knees/ankles
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of other neurological deficit that could interfere, such as previous stroke or muscle disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe pain that precludes study participation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: other medical condition that precludes participation in an exercise program, e.g., unstable angina, uncontrolled diabetes, uncontrolled hypertension
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. They have undergone radiation and chemotherapy but are still experiencing symptoms.
